abstract.p: Harley-Davidson sets up nationwide network of company-approved renal outlets where renters can get late-model low-mileage Harleys, helmets, rain suits and 24-hour roadside assistance (S)

block.p: Harley-Davidson has set up a nationwide network of company-approved rental outlets where renters can get late-model low-mileage Harleys and use of a helmet and rain suit and 24-hour roadside assistance. Prices will vary from dealer to dealer. Information: (877) 437-3682 or www .hdrentals.com.

Hotel-room honor bars are usually known for cans of soda, tiny liquor bottles and macadamia nuts. But the Kimpton Group has added more. At its Hotel Monaco Chicago, massage oil costs $12. The Triton in San Francisco has a rubber duck ($4) and the Hotel Monaco Denver a Pez dispenser ($2) in each room. (800) 546-7866.
